title: High Level Segment Statement by Hon. Prof. G.L. Peiris at the UNHRC
content: Sri Lanka raised objection to the use of voluntary funding which has the necessary consequence of undermining objectivity and detachment. Against this background, Sri Lanka once again reiterated its view that the evidence gathering mechanism established under OP 6 of resolution 46/1 is unhelpful to the people of Sri Lanka, will polarize Sri Lankan society, and adversely affect economic development, peace and harmony at achallenging time. This was stated by Hon. Prof. G.L. Peiris, Minister of Foreign Affairsat the 49th session of the Human Rights Council - High Level Segment Statement.
